definition: camel/white horse with a black mane (archaic)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Camels are represented in the New World by lamas.
sentences.chinese: 在新世界駱馬相當於駱駝。
想捕獲一頭駱馬並不容易。

sentences.english: People gather around the disfigured bodies of vicunas that were allegedly killed by poachers.
sentences.chinese: 人們聚集在被偷獵者非法獵殺的駱馬屍體周圍。
